      • surveyComponents

        public int surveyComponents()
        Called from the layout manager to setup this panel's components. Actually, I remove all the components from the pane and add them back.

      • addDateLabel

        public void addDateLabel()
        Add the date label. The date label is the first line in a calendar pane. It always contains the day of the month and often contains meals or other information.

      • addMealLabel

        public int addMealLabel(CalendarCache itemCache,
               java.lang.String strMeal,
               int iXNextMeal)
        Add the meal label.
        Parameters:
        iXNextMeal - Next location to place the meal (if -1, find a free location).

      • addItemLabel

        public void addItemLabel(CalendarCache itemCache)
        Add the label(s) for this item that fall into this panel. 1. Start Icon (at start date) 2. Description up to end date (opt) 3. End Icon (opt) 4. Description up to end of desc (opt if desc is displayed)
